name: CareTeamCategory
title: Care Team Category
description:
(Clinical Focus: Indicates the type of care team.),(Data Element Scope: Each care team can have multiple care team type categories assigned to describe it.),(Inclusion Criteria: Specific concepts determined to be terms used to classify a care team, for example: Event-focused, Longitudinal care coordination focused, Condition focused, Public health focused.
This is the LOINC List LL4590-7 that is connected to LOINC 86744-0 Care Team),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: Home & Community Based Services (HCBS)-focused care team
